name: Bloodjak II
description:
The dead don't submit high scores.

Bloodjak II is a side-scrolling arcade shoot-em-up set in the darkest gauntlet of netspace. In order to complete a run and submit a score, you must safely jack out of the system. However, if you are shot down before then, both your score and your life are forever lost...

Features:

  • A procedurally generated, addicting, and unforgiving score attack experience for players of all skill levels. Test your abilities. You die in a single hit, and lose your score when you do. There are no extra lives.
  • Jack out to end your run and save your score. Once you initiate the jack out sequence, you must survive for 20 more seconds. Don't get complacent.
  • Online high score support via Game Jolt - compete with netrunners from around the world!

Twitter: @BloodjakII

Credits:

  • Alex Higgins - design, programming, and particle, projectile, and background art
  • Danielle Vuono - player and enemy art and logo
  • Dan Halma - music
  • Alex Cole - sound effects
